maqras.text: 43|57|Arau yetiya'i mara'iyama-putrara udaharana diya haya, tetiya'i tomara sampradayara loke ciyamra-bakhara karai hulasthula laga'i diye.
43|58|Arau sihamte kaya, ‘amara upasyabilaka sraestha ne icha’? Sihamte kerala baka-bitandara uddesyehe tomara sanmukhata te'omra katha dani dharae. Baram sihamta eta kajiya-praiya sampradaya.
43|59|Te'om kerala mora ejana bandahe achila. Yara oparata ami anugraha karaichilo arau te'omka ami bani icharaa'ilara babe drstanta bana'ichilo.
43|60|Arau yadi ami iccha karailohemtena, tente tomalokara paraibarte phiraista srsti karailohemtena, yisakale prthiraita uttaraadhikarai ha’lehemtena.
43|61|Arau niscaya icha kiyamatara niscita nidarsana; seye tomaloke kiyamata samparke sandeha posana nakaraiba. Tomaloke kerala morae'i anusarana karaa. E'itorae'i sarala patha.
43|62|Cayatane yena tomalokaka ketiya'o badha pradana karaiba noraarae. Niscaya si tomalokara prakasya satrau.

43|63|Arau yetiya icha'i spasta pramanadi lai ahile, tetiya te'om ka’le, ‘arasye ma'i tomalokara ocarata hikamatasaha ahicho arau tomaloke yibora bisayata matabheda karaicha se'ibora spasta karaibalai ahicho. Seye tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau mora anugatya karaa.
43|64|‘Niscaya allaha, teraemi mora raba arau tomalokarao raba. Eteke tomaloke te'omrae'i ibadata karaa; e'itorae'i sarala patha’.
43|65|Tathapi'o sihamtara majara kichumana dale matanaikya srsti karaile, seye yalimasakalara babe yantranadayaka dinara sastira durbhoga
43|66|sihamte kerala sihamtara ajanite akasmikabharae kiyamata ahara apeksata ache.
43|67|Se'idina antaranga bandhusakale'o ijane sijanara satrau hai paraiba, kerala muttakbisakalara bahirae.
43|68|He mora bandasakala! Aji tomalokara kono bhaya na'i arau tomaloke cintita'o naha’ba.
43|69|Yisakale amara ayatara prati imana anichila arau te'omloka achila muchalima
43|70|tomaloka arau tomalokara straisakala anandacitte jannatata praraesa karaa.
43|71|Sonara thala arau panapatra lai te'omlokaka pradaksina karaa ha’ba, tata mane yi bicarae arau yitorae caku trpta haya se'i sakalo thakiba, arau tata tomaloke sthayi ha’ba.
43|72|E'itorae'i jannata, tomalokaka yitora adhikarai karaa haiche, tomalokara amalara phalasbaraupe.
43|73|Tata tomalokara babe ache pracura phalamula, tara paraa tomaloke khaba.
43|74|Niscaya aparaadhibilaka jahannamara sastita sthayi ha’ba
43|75|sihamtara sasti laghara karaa naha’ba arau sihamte tata hatasa hai paraiba.
43|76|Arau ami sihamtara prati an'yaya karaa nachilo, kintu sihamta nije'i achila yalima.
43|77|Sihamte ciyamrai ciyamrai ka’ba, ‘he malika! Tomara pratipalake yena amaka nihsesa karai diye’. Te'om ka’ba, ‘niscaya tomaloke enekaiye thakiba lagiba’.
43|78|Allahe ka’ba, ‘arasye ami tomalokara ocarata satya lai ahichilo, kintu tomalokara sarahabhage'i achila satya apachandakarai’.
43|79|Sihamte kono bisaye curanta sid'dhanta grahana karaiche neki? Niscaya amihe curanta sid'dhantakarai.
43|80|Athaba sihamte bhabe neki ye, ami sihamtara gopana bisaya arau mantrana sunibalai napa'om? Arasye sunibalai pa'om. Amara phiraistasakala sihamtara ocarate thaki likhe.
43|81|Koraa, ‘rahamanara yadi kono santana thakilehemtena tente maye'i prathama te'omra ibadatata ghrnakaraisakalara agrani ha’lohemtena
43|82|sihamte yi araopa karae tara paraa akasasamuha, prthiraira pratipalaka arau arachara raba ati paraitra-mahana.
43|83|Eteke tumi sihamtaka erai diya, sihamte magna thakaka behuda kathata arau khela-dhemalita matta thakaka, se'idinara sanmukhina nohoraa laike yito dinara pratisrauti sihamtaka diya haiche.
43|84|Teraemi satya ilaha akasata arau teraemi satya ilaha prthiraita. Te'om prajnamaya, sarbajna.

43|85|Arau te'om barakatamaya, yara kartrtbata ache akasasamuha, prthirai arau e'i duyora madhyararti sakalo bastu. Arau kiyamatara jnana kerala te'omra ocarate'i, arau te'omra ocarate'i tomalokaka pratyarartita karaa ha’ba.
43|86|Arau te'omra bahirae sihamte yiboraka ahbana karae, sihamte ketiya'o chuparaichara adhikarai naha’ba, kintu te'omlokara bahirae yisakale jani-suni satya saksya diye.
43|87|Arau yadi tumi sihamtaka sodha, ‘kone sihamtaka srsti karaiche’? Sihamte arasye ka’ba ‘allaha’. Tathapi'o sihamte kenekai bimukha haiche
43|88|arau te'omra (raachulara) e'i bani ye, ‘he mora raba! Niscaya ihamta enekuraa sampradaya yihamte imana posana nakaraiba’.
43|89|Eteke tumi sihamtaka upeksa karaa arau koraa, ‘chalama’. Kintu sihamte (iyara parainama) anatipalame janibalai paba.
44|1|Ha-mima.
44|2|Sapata suspasta kitabara
44|3|niscaya iyaka ami aratirna karaicho eta barakatamaya raatita; niscaya ami satarkakarai.
44|4|Se'i raatita pratyeka curanta sid'dhanta sthira karaa haya
44|5|amara adesa anusarae. Niscaya amiye'i raachula praeranakarai.
44|6|Tomara pratipalakara taraphara paraa rahamatasbaraupe; niscaya te'om sarbasraota, sarbajna
44|7|teraemi akasasamuha, prthirai arau e'i duyora majara sakalo bastura raba; yadi tomaloke niscita bisbasi horaa.
44|8|Te'omra bahirae ana kono satya ilaha na'i, teraemi jirana dana karae arau teraemi mrtyu ghataya; teraemi tomalokara raba arau tomalokara pitr-purausasakalorao raba.
44|9|Baram sihamte sandehara basabarti hai khela-dhemali karai ache.
44|10|Eteke tumi apeksa karaa se'i dinatolai, yidina spasta dhomraarae acchanna ha’ba akasa
44|11|Yitorae manuhaka abrta karai pelaba. E'ito yantranadayaka sasti.
44|12|(Sihamte ka’ba) ‘he amara raba! Amara paraa sasti dura karai diya, niscaya ami mumina hama’.
44|13|Kenekai sihamte upadesa grahana karaiba? Athaca itipurbe sihamtara ocarata ahichila ejana spasta raachula
44|14|tara pichata sihamte te'omra paraa mukha ghuraa'i laichila arau kaichila, ‘e'om ejana siksapraapta unmada’.
44|15|Niscaya ami alapa samayara karane sasti rahita karaima, (kintu) niscaya tomaloka tomalokara agara arasthalai ubhati yaba.
44|16|Yidina ami prabalabharae karaayatta karaima, se'idina niscaya ami hama pratisodha grahanakarai.
